pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7875538756/job/21487623536)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7875538756/job/21487622527)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7875538756/job/21487622796)

I'm not sure I follow the name. Maybe just
```suggestion
@[simp] theorem exists_exists_exists_and_eq {α β γ : Type*}
```

Nowadays you can even do this!
```suggestion
    (x : L) ∈ Submodule.span R {⁅y, z⁆ | (y ∈ rootSpace H α) (z ∈ rootSpace H (-α))} := by
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: the pairing of a Lie algebra root space with its negative

source.title: The roots of a Lie algebra are a root system.
